sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Setting NLQ output source to BNF for all records in nlq_query_log table till and including vancouver release. </description>
        <name>Set NLQ OutputSource to BNF</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('nlq_query_log');
var bnf = "BNF";
var outputSource = "output_source";
gr.addNullQuery(outputSource);
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    gr.setValue(outputSource, bnf);
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-07-10 19:58:26</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c900a604c3003110d4cc21007d40dd4b</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set NLQ OutputSource to BNF</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Natural Language Query" source="com.snc.nlq">bb8b74643c35311068bcf327dfe37fe1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c900a604c3003110d4cc21007d40dd4b</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-28 06:17:18</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
